#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
void levenshteinDis(const char* str1, const char* str2, int m, int n,
int i, int j, int edist, int &mind) {
if (i == m || j == n) {
if (i < m) edist += (m-i);
if (j < n) edist += (n-j);
if (edist < mind) mind = edist;
return;
}

if (str1[i] == str2[j]) {
levenshteinDis(str1, str2, m, n, i+1, j+1, edist, mind);
} else {
// åˆ é™¤æˆ–å¢åŠ 
levenshteinDis(str1, str2, m, n, i+1, j, edist+1, mind);
levenshteinDis(str1, str2, m, n, i, j+1, edist+1, mind);
// æ›¿æ¢æ“ä½œ
levenshteinDis(str1, str2, m, n, i+1, j+1, edist+1, mind);
}
}

int levenshteinDis(const char* a, const char* b, int m, int n) {
int mind = 0xfffffff;
levenshteinDis(a, b, m, n, 0, 0, 0, mind);
return mind;
}

/*
* çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹
* 1.å½“a[i] != b[j], min_edist(i,j) = min(min_edist(i-1,j)+1, min_edist(i,j-1)+1, min_edist(i-1, j-1)+1)
* 2.å½“a[i] == b[j], min_edist(i,j) = min(min_edist(i-1,j)+1, min_edist(i,j-1)+1, min_edist(i-1, j-1))
*/
int levenshteinDisDP(const char* a, const char* b, int m, int n) {
// åˆå§‹åŒ–dpæ•°ç»„
int dp[m][n];
for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) {
dp[i][j] = 0;
}
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¬¬0åˆ—
for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
if (a[i] == b[0]) dp[i][0] = i;
else if (i != 0) dp[i][0] = dp[i-1][0] + 1;
else dp[i][0] = 1;
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¬¬0è¡Œ
for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
if (a[0] == b[i]) dp[0][i] = i;
else if (i > 0) dp[0][i] = dp[0][i-1] + 1;
else dp[0][i] = 1;
}

// å¡«è¡¨ä½™ä¸‹éƒ¨åˆ†
for (int i = 1; i < m; ++i) {
for (int j = 1; j < n; ++j) {
dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-1][j]+1, dp[i][j-1]+1,
a[i] == b[j] ? dp[i-1][j-1]:dp[i-1][j-1]+1);
}
}
return dp[m-1][n-1];
}
